metadata.name: Sci-Fi NPC Generator
metadata.author: Rolldeo Community
metadata.description: A comprehensive **system-agnostic** NPC generator for science fiction TTRPGs. Generates complete NPCs with names, physical descriptions, personalities, and backgrounds across seven unique spacefaring species.
metadata.instructions: Roll on `fullNPC` for a complete character, or use individual templates like `npcName`, `npcPhysicalDescription`, `npcPersonalitySummary`, or `npcBackgroundSummary` for specific elements. All shared variables are accessible within a single generation for consistent results.

copyright.notice: © 2024 Rolldeo Community. Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0.

tables.name: Gender
tables.description: Determines the NPC's gender identity.

tables.name: Species
tables.description: The NPC's species. Each species has unique naming conventions and physical characteristics.

entries.description: The most widespread species in the galaxy, known for their adaptability and ambition.
Artificial beings ranging from humanoid androids to fully digital consciousnesses housed in mechanical frames.
Tall, slender beings with innate psionic abilities. Their translucent skin reveals faintly glowing neural pathways.

sets.physicalBase: tall slender humanoid with translucent skin

entries.description: Reptilian species with scaled hides and keen predatory instincts. They possess excellent night vision and thermal sensing.

sets.physicalBase: muscular reptilian humanoid with scaled hide

entries.description: Insectoid beings with chitinous exoskeletons and compound eyes. They maintain a limited hive-mind connection with their clutch-mates.
Massive, heavily-built warriors with thick hides and prominent tusks. They come from a high-gravity world and value strength and honor.

sets.physicalBase: massive heavily-built humanoid with thick hide

entries.description: Silicon-based lifeforms with bodies composed of living crystal lattices. They communicate through harmonic resonance and light patterns.

tables.name: Human Male First Names
tables.description: First names for male Humans, reflecting diverse cultural origins across colonized space.

tables.name: Human Female First Names
tables.description: First names for female Humans, reflecting diverse cultural origins across colonized space.

tables.name: Human Neutral First Names
tables.description: Gender-neutral first names for Humans.

tables.name: Human Surnames
tables.description: Surnames for Humans, often reflecting ancestral homeworld or colony of origin.

tables.name: Synthetic Designations
tables.description: Personal designations for Synthetic beings, often chosen or assigned at activation.

tables.name: Synthetic Model Series
tables.description: Manufacturing series or lineage identifiers for Synthetic beings.

tables.name: Veth'kai Male Names
tables.description: Names for male Veth'kai, characterized by flowing syllables that reflect their psionic nature.

tables.name: Veth'kai Female Names
tables.description: Names for female Veth'kai, characterized by flowing syllables that reflect their psionic nature.

tables.name: Veth'kai Neutral Names
tables.description: Gender-neutral names for Veth'kai.

tables.name: Veth'kai House Names
tables.description: House names for Veth'kai, representing ancient psionic lineages.

tables.name: Saurix Male Names
tables.description: Names for male Saurix, featuring harsh consonants and guttural sounds.

tables.name: Saurix Female Names
tables.description: Names for female Saurix, featuring sibilant sounds and sharp endings.

tables.name: Saurix Neutral Names
tables.description: Gender-neutral names for Saurix.

tables.name: Saurix Clan Names
tables.description: Clan names for Saurix, denoting ancestral hunting territories and lineage.

tables.name: Nexari Names
tables.description: Personal names for Nexari. Their species uses the same naming conventions regardless of gender.

tables.name: Nexari Hive Designations
tables.description: Hive designations for Nexari, indicating their clutch of origin and role within the collective.

tables.name: Gorath Male Names
tables.description: Names for male Gorath, featuring heavy syllables that can be bellowed across battlefields.

tables.name: Gorath Female Names
tables.description: Names for female Gorath, carrying the same weight and power as male names.

tables.name: Gorath Neutral Names
tables.description: Gender-neutral names for Gorath.

tables.name: Gorath Tribal Names
tables.description: Tribal names for Gorath, representing warrior clans and ancestral allegiances.

tables.name: Crystalline Designations
tables.description: Personal designations for Crystalline beings, based on their unique harmonic frequencies.

tables.name: Crystalline Resonance Names
tables.description: Resonance patterns that identify Crystalline lineage and frequency family.

tables.name: Eye Color
tables.description: Eye colors appropriate for various species. Results should be interpreted based on species physiology.

tables.name: Hair Description
tables.description: Hair styles and descriptions. For species without traditional hair, interpret as equivalent features (crests, tendrils, etc.).

entries.value: synthetic fiber hair in an unnatural color

tables.name: Body Type
tables.description: General body type and build.

tables.name: Distinguishing Mark
tables.description: A notable physical feature or mark that makes this NPC memorable.

entries.value: a prominent scar across their face
a notable scar on their hand
circuit-pattern tattoos that may be functional
memorial tattoos with names and dates
old burn scarring on visible skin
subtle glowing implants beneath the skin
hands that tell stories of hard work
an unusual coloration or pattern for their species

tables.name: Clothing Style
tables.description: General clothing and fashion sense.

entries.value: practical, utilitarian clothing with many pockets
durable work clothes showing signs of use
a worn flight suit or spacer's jumpsuit
light personal armor or armored clothing
an environmental suit or partial suit
medical scrubs or a lab coat
a service industry or ship's uniform
an eclectic mix of styles from different cultures

tables.name: Accessory
tables.description: A notable accessory or personal item.

entries.value: a well-used datapad they frequently check
a visible sidearm in a holster
distinctive jewelry with apparent sentimental value
a religious or cultural symbol worn openly
a belt of tools or equipment
a distinctive scarf or neck covering
a messenger bag or satchel always at their side
a small creature or drone companion
a personal flask they occasionally drink from

tables.name: Primary Personality Trait
tables.description: The NPC's most dominant personality characteristic.

sets.traitDesc: driven to achieve and advance at any cost
careful and risk-averse in all dealings
endlessly interested in learning new things
doubtful of others' motives and sincerity
skilled at navigating social situations and conflicts
unconventional in thought and behavior
warm and approachable with strangers
rough in manner but not necessarily unkind
strongly committed to a personal code of ethics
motivated by beliefs in how things should be
good-humored and fond of laughter
systematic and orderly in approach
emotionally intense about their interests
focused on practical solutions over ideals
quiet and slow to reveal themselves to others
willing to do whatever it takes to succeed
controlled and unflappable under pressure
inclined to take others at their word
holds grudges and seeks payback for wrongs
tired and experienced, having seen too much

tables.name: Secondary Personality Trait
tables.description: A secondary personality characteristic that adds depth.

sets.trait2Desc: tends to break down problems logically
prone to deep thought and reflection
quick to make decisions and stick to them
attuned to others' emotions and needs
asks many questions and seeks understanding
devoted to those they consider friends or allies
often reflects on and romanticizes the past
instinctively shields those they care about
uses ironic humor, sometimes at others' expense

tables.name: Personality Flaw
tables.description: A notable character flaw or weakness.

sets.flawDesc: prone to developing unhealthy dependencies
overestimates their own importance and abilities
tends to flee from danger or conflict
lies easily and often
resentful of others' success or possessions
prioritizes wealth above most other concerns
easily deceived by others
quick to anger and slow to calm
struggles to commit to choices
quick to form and express negative opinions
avoids effort when possible
takes on more than they can handle
focuses on trivial slights and grievances
acts without considering consequences
keeps too much hidden, even from allies
questions their own worth and abilities
refuses to change course even when wrong
excessively concerned with appearance and reputation
seeks revenge for perceived wrongs
neglects personal life for professional pursuits

tables.name: Core Motivation
tables.description: What fundamentally drives this NPC.

sets.motivationDesc: They believe money solves problems and provides security.
They seek control over their own destiny and others'.
They hunger to understand the universe's secrets.
Their family comes before everything else.
Someone wronged them, and they won't rest until the score is settled.
They carry guilt and seek to make amends.
In a dangerous galaxy, just staying alive is achievement enough.
They are bound by obligation to a cause, person, or organization.
They chafe under any restriction and seek true independence.
They want to be remembered, to make their mark on history.
A person they love drives their every decision.
They believe in fairness and work to make things right.
Life is short; they intend to enjoy it.
They want to belong, to be valued by others.
The frontier calls to them; they must see what's out there.
They've seen chaos and now value order above all.
They have a vision for how things should be and work to make it reality.
They want to create something that outlasts them.

tables.name: Personality Quirk
tables.description: An unusual habit, behavior, or mannerism.

entries.value: frequently quotes from a favorite text or vid
constantly fidgets with a small object
taps surfaces in patterns when thinking
rarely sits; prefers to stand or pace
frequently touches their face when lying
never forgets a face or name
always notes exits when entering a room
tells long, rambling stories from the past

tables.name: Speech Pattern
tables.description: How this NPC speaks and communicates.

entries.value: tends to be long-winded and verbose
speaks softly, forcing others to lean in
speaks loudly, as if always giving orders
speaks in a flat, monotone voice
speaks with animated gestures and expressions
has a distinctive regional or colonial accent
speaks in an almost poetic, flowery manner
relies heavily on sarcasm and irony
blunt and direct, avoiding social niceties
has a distinctive catchphrase they overuse

tables.name: Profession
tables.description: The NPC's primary occupation or role.

sets.professionDesc: navigates vessels through the void between worlds
keeps machines and ships running
buys and sells goods across the sector
fights for a cause, a company, or credits
treats the sick and wounded
pushes the boundaries of knowledge
moves goods past those who would stop them
tracks and captures those with prices on their heads
extracts resources from rocks in the void
manages systems, people, or organizations
navigates political waters between factions
brings joy, art, or distraction to others
protects people, places, or information
infiltrates digital systems for profit or principle
serves customers and hears their stories
operates outside the law as a way of life
upholds the law, for better or worse
tends to spiritual needs and faith communities
uncovers and shares stories with the public
ventures into the unknown and reports back
grows food in domes, hydroponics, or terraformed land
loads, unloads, and manages freight
recovers value from wrecks and ruins
wields power through economic influence
passes knowledge to the next generation
has stepped back from active work

tables.name: Social Class
tables.description: The NPC's socioeconomic standing.

sets.classDesc: barely surviving, often homeless or dependent on charity
employed in labor or service, living paycheck to paycheck
comfortable but not wealthy, with some security
well-off professionals or successful business owners
among the most powerful and privileged in society
rejected by mainstream society for various reasons
working to pay off debts with limited freedom

tables.name: Relationship Status
tables.description: The NPC's current romantic or family situation.

entries.value: in an arranged or political union
devoted to their work instead of romance

tables.name: Homeworld Type
tables.description: The type of world or environment where this NPC grew up.

sets.worldDesc: still being settled, with frontier mentality
devoted to food production, often rural
harsh conditions focused on resource extraction
born and raised entirely in space
raised in a regimented, martial environment
part of a traveling community of ships

tables.name: Faction Affiliation
tables.description: The organization or group this NPC is most closely aligned with.

sets.factionDesc: bound by duty and chain of command
devoted to a faith or spiritual movement
part of an underground trade operation
left or was expelled from their former group
primarily loyal to neighbors and home

tables.name: Secret or Rumor
tables.description: Something hidden about or whispered regarding this NPC.

entries.value: is living under a false identity
is wanted for a crime (may be innocent)
is secretly working for another faction
has a terminal illness they're hiding
owes a massive debt to dangerous people
is in love with someone forbidden
has hidden psionic or unusual abilities
has no particular secrets (or hides them very well)
is retired from a notorious profession
is a political or religious fugitive

tables.name: Current Goal
tables.description: What this NPC is actively trying to accomplish right now.

entries.value: learn a new skill or trade
find a cure for an illness
make a valuable connection or alliance

tables.name: Age Category
tables.description: The NPC's relative age (interpreted based on species lifespan).

sets.ageDesc: recently reached maturity, still finding their place
in the prime of their life
experienced, perhaps starting to show their years
advanced in years, carrying accumulated wisdom
remarkably old, even for their species

templates.name: NPC Name Generator
templates.description: Generates a full name based on rolled gender and race, using the appropriate naming conventions for each species.

templates.name: NPC Physical Description
templates.description: Generates a physical description for an NPC based on their species and rolled characteristics.
templates.pattern: A {{$age}} {{$gender}} {{$race}} ({{$race.@physicalBase}}) with a {{$body}} build. They have {{$eyes}} eyes{{switch[$race.@hasHair=="true":" and {{$hair}}"].switch[$race.@hasHair=="mane":" and a mane of {{$hair}}"].else[""]}}. {{switch[$mark=="no particularly distinctive physical features":"They have no particularly distinctive physical features."].else["Notably, they have {{$mark}}."]}} They wear {{$clothing}}{{switch[$accessory=="no particularly notable accessories":"."].else[" and carry {{$accessory}}."]}}

templates.name: NPC Personality Summary
templates.description: Generates a personality summary including traits, flaws, motivations, and quirks.
templates.pattern:
**Personality:** Primarily {{$primary}} ({{$primary.@traitDesc}}) and {{$secondary}} ({{$secondary.@trait2Desc}}). However, they {{$flaw}} ({{$flaw.@flawDesc}}).

**Motivation:** Their core drive is {{$motivation}}. {{$motivation.@motivationDesc}}

**Quirk:** They {{$quirk}}.

**Speech:** They {{$speech}}.

templates.name: NPC Background Summary
templates.description: Generates background information including profession, social class, homeworld, and allegiances.
templates.pattern:
**Profession:** A {{$profession}} ({{$profession.@professionDesc}}).

**Social Standing:** {{$class}} ({{$class.@classDesc}}).

**Personal Life:** Currently {{$relationship}}.

**Origin:** Originally from {{$homeworld}} ({{$homeworld.@worldDesc}}).

**Allegiance:** Affiliated with {{$faction}} ({{$faction.@factionDesc}}).

**Secret:** They {{$secret}}.

**Current Goal:** Their immediate objective is to {{$goal}}.

templates.name: Complete NPC Generator
templates.description: Generates a complete NPC with all characteristics. All rolled values are accessible as shared variables throughout the generation for consistency.
templates.pattern:
# {{switch[$gender=="male":$race.@maleFirstName].switch[$gender=="female":$race.@femaleFirstName].else[$race.@neutralFirstName]}} {{$race.@surname}}

## Basic Information
| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **Species** | {{$race}} |
| **Gender** | {{$gender}} |
| **Age** | {{$age}} ({{$age.@ageDesc}}) |
| **Profession** | {{$profession}} |
| **Social Class** | {{$class}} |
| **Relationship** | {{$relationship}} |

## Physical Description

A {{$age}} {{$gender}} {{$race}} ({{$race.@physicalBase}}) with a {{$body}} build. They have {{$eyes}} eyes{{switch[$race.@hasHair=="true":" and {{$hair}}"].switch[$race.@hasHair=="mane":" and a mane of {{$hair}}"].else[""]}}. {{switch[$mark=="no particularly distinctive physical features":"They have no particularly distinctive physical features."].else["Notably, they have {{$mark}}."]}} They wear {{$clothing}}{{switch[$accessory=="no particularly notable accessories":"."].else[" and carry {{$accessory}}."]}}

## Personality

**Primary Trait:** {{$primary}} — {{$primary.@traitDesc}}

**Secondary Trait:** {{$secondary}} — {{$secondary.@trait2Desc}}

**Flaw:** They {{$flaw}} — {{$flaw.@flawDesc}}

**Quirk:** They {{$quirk}}.

**Speech Pattern:** They {{$speech}}.

## Background

**Homeworld:** Originally from {{$homeworld}} — {{$homeworld.@worldDesc}}

**Allegiance:** {{$faction}} — {{$faction.@factionDesc}}

**Current Goal:** To {{$goal}}.

## Motivation & Secrets

**Core Motivation:** {{$motivation}} — {{$motivation.@motivationDesc}}

**Secret/Rumor:** They {{$secret}}.

---

*{{$profession.@professionDesc}}*

templates.name: Quick NPC Generator
templates.description: Generates a brief NPC summary suitable for quick reference or minor characters.

templates.name: NPC Appearance Only
templates.description: Generates just the physical appearance of an NPC without personality or background.
templates.pattern: A {{$age}} {{$gender}} {{$race}} with a {{$body}} build, {{$eyes}} eyes{{switch[$race.@hasHair=="true":", and {{$hair}}"].switch[$race.@hasHair=="mane":", and a mane of {{$hair}}"].else[""]}}. {{switch[$mark=="no particularly distinctive physical features":""].else["They have {{$mark}}."]}}

templates.name: NPC Encounter Line
templates.description: A single line describing an NPC suitable for encounter tables.
